title: Slave Harvest
description: Having failed to resist the Scytharene alien attack, Travis and his friends are beamed on board spaceships, along with many other children—to become slaves. Just when it seems that there is no hope, help arrives from two unexpected Darion, one of the Scytharene, who despises the destructiveness of his race, and a group of scientists, the last remaining adults, who have been hiding underground and have access to some serious weapons. A mission like this will involve great sacrifice—but will it be enough to end the terror of the Scytharene?
author: Andrew Butcher
